name: torrra
description: Torrra is a self-hosted torrent management application that centralizes torrent searching, adding, and monitoring across multiple clients using a unified web interface.
features: Multi-client support: Manage torrents across multiple torrent clients from a single interface.
Torrent search: Search for torrents across multiple indexers and trackers without visiting each site.
Unified dashboard: View all active torrents from different clients in one consolidated view.
Remote management: Control torrent clients running on different machines from a central web interface.
Download monitoring: Track download progress, speeds, and completion status across all clients.
Torrent adding: Add torrents to any connected client by URL, magnet link, or file upload.
Client switching: Move torrents between different clients for load balancing or client-specific features.
Statistics: View aggregate statistics on downloads, upload ratios, and bandwidth usage.
Notifications: Receive alerts when torrents complete or encounter errors.
Search filters: Filter search results by size, seeders, quality, or other criteria to find the best torrents.
Category management: Organize torrents with categories and labels for better organization.
Mobile access: Manage torrents from mobile devices with a responsive web interface.
